sense.def:
A rumour
je resničen ali neresničen podatek, ki kroži med ljudmi.

seg.quote: There's a rumour that Mangel is coming here to speak.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
is rumoured to be true
, ljudje govorijo, da je tisto res, vendar tega ne vedo zanesljivo.

seg.quote: He was rumored to be living in Detroit.
It was rumoured that the body had been removed.
